statements: SELECT * FROM User_Profile;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM User_Profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, bio FROM User_Profile WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT email, avatar_url FROM User_Profile WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM User_Profile ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User_Profile WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM User_Profile WHERE location = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY username
SELECT username, avatar_url, bio FROM User_Profile WHERE bio IS NOT NULL ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM User_Profile WHERE location LIKE 'Los%' OR location LIKE '%Angeles' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, age, location, bio FROM User_Profile WHERE age < 30 AND (location = 'San Francisco' OR location = 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, profile_pic_url FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM permissions
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, email, profile_pic_url FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%'

SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_profiles JOIN user_permissions ON user_profiles.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT up.user_id, u.username, p.permission_name FROM user_permissions up JOIN users u ON up.user_id = u.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, up.bio, up.location FROM users u JOIN user_profiles up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.age < 40;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, p.bio, p.avatar_url FROM users u JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.bio IS NOT NULL AND p.avatar_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, n.message, n.created_at FROM notifications n JOIN users u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.is_read = FALSE ORDER BY n.created_at ASC;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(f.friendship_id) AS total_friends FROM users u JOIN friendships f ON u.user_id = f.user_id_1 OR u.user_id = f.user_id_2 GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_friends > 0 ORDER BY total_friends DESC;
